甼字的基本解释

甼
tǐng
古同“町”。

甼
dīng
古同“町”。

甼字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tǐng］［tīng］
［《廣韻》他鼎切，上迥，透。］
［《廣韻》徒鼎切，上迥，定。］
［《廣韻》他丁切，平青，透。］
亦作“甼1”。
(1)田界；田间小路。参见“町畦”。
(2)田亩；田地。
(3)古代地积单位名。
[②]［zhèng］
［《集韻》丈梗切，上梗，澄。］
亦作“圢1”。
平地。
[③]［tiǎn］
［《廣韻》他典切，上銑，透。］
见“町3畽”。
[④]［dīng］
地名用字。云南省德宏傣族景颇族自治州有畹町镇。

甼字的康熙字典解释
甼字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
甼字的起名意思

暂无。

甼
Basic explanation of words
甼
tǐng
The ancient same "town".
甼
dīng
The ancient same "town".
甼
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tǐng］［tīng］
["Guang Yun" He is cut, on the top, and through. ]
["Guangyun" Tu Dingqi, Shang Jiong, Ding. ]
["Guang Yun" He Ding cut, flat green, through. ]
Also known as "甼1".
(1) Field boundary; field path. See "Ding Qi".
(2) Acre; field.
(3) The name of the ancient plot unit.
[②]［zhèng］
["Jiyun" Zhang stem cut, upper stem, clear. ]
Also known as "圢1".
Flat ground.
[③] [tiǎn]
["Guangyun" he cut, milled, and penetrated. ]
See "Ting 3 畽".
[④]［dīng］
Place names in words. There is Wanding Town in Dehong Dai and Jingpo Autonomous Prefecture in Yunnan Province.
甼
